Package org.openlca.core.matrix

Class TechIndex

java.lang.Object
org.openlca.core.matrix.TechIndex
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<ProcessProduct>, MatrixIndex<ProcessProduct>, TechLinker, Copyable<MatrixIndex<ProcessProduct>>
public final class TechIndex extends Object implements TechLinker, MatrixIndex<ProcessProduct>
The index $\mathit{Idx}_A$ of the technology matrix $\mathbf{A}$ of a product system. It maps the process-product pairs (or process-waste pairs) $\mathit{P}$ of the product system to the respective $n$ rows and columns of $\mathbf{A}$. If the product system contains other product systems as sub-systems, these systems are handled like processes and are also mapped as pair with their quantitative reference flow to that index (and also their processes etc.).

$$\mathit{Idx}_A: \mathit{P} \mapsto [0 \dots n-1]$$

  • Nested Class Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • TechIndex

      public TechIndex​(ProcessProduct refFlow)
      Creates a new technosphere index of a product system.
      Parameters:
      refFlow - the reference product-output or waste-input as (processId, flowId) pair.

  • Method Details

    • of

      public static TechIndex of​(ProductSystem system, IDatabase db)
      Creates the index for the given product system. If the `withoutNetwork` attribute of the system is set to true, it creates an unlinked index with all process products (and waste flows) from the database. Otherwise all process links of the product system are directly stored in the index.

    • of

      public static TechIndex of​(IDatabase db)
      Creates an unlinked index of all process products (and waste flows) of the database in some arbitrary order.

    • setDemand

      public void setDemand​(double demand)
      The demand value. This is the amount of the reference flow given in the reference unit and flow property. The default value is 1.0.

    • getRefFlow

      public ProcessProduct getRefFlow()
      Get the reference product-output or waste-input of the product system described by this index.

    • getDemand

      public double getDemand()
      The demand value. This is the amount of the reference flow given in the reference unit and flow property. The default value is 1.0.

    • size

      public int size()
      Returns the size of this index which is equal to the number of rows and columns in the related technology matrix.

    • of

      public int of​(ProcessProduct provider)
      Returns the ordinal index of the given product (product-output or waste input). If the product is not not part of this index, -1 is returned.

    • putLink

      public void putLink​(LongPair exchange, ProcessProduct provider)
      Adds a process link to this index.
      Parameters:
      exchange - The linked product-input or waste-output as (processId, exchangeId) pair.
      provider - The product-output or waste-input (provider) as (processId, flowId) pair.

    • providerOf

      public ProcessProduct providerOf​(CalcExchange e)
      Description copied from interface: TechLinker
      Get the linked provider for the given product input or waste output. You should never pass null into this method. Also make sure that the given exchange is linkable.
      Specified by:
      providerOf in interface TechLinker
